nodes.bodyText:
I think this is actually wrong - you won't share the ContextState which mean any changes into the context on new thread (newly created beans) won't propagate back to the original active context. E.g. the "backward propagation" will break.
But scrambling through the code, I don't this this is tested on MP CP level(which it should be), there is only ArC ContextState test here.
